htmlData.description: Resources returns all tables that the service includes, as well as a description of the table, all columns, their unit and a description of each column
Resource returns the instantaneous value of all columns in a table or the value of a specific column

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: The table to obtain the data records

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: A specific column to obtain the data records in a table

htmlData.description: Raw returns all information about a table within the interval that they are stored in database

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: The table to obtain the data records

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: A specific column to obtain the data records in a table

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date for obtaining data records from a table

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date for obtaining data records from a table

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The start time for obtaining data records from a table

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The end time for obtaining data records from a table

htmlData.description: Analytics returns all records of a table between two dates, with an interval between data defined in the request, aggregating the data according to the chosen method

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The way data will be aggregated

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: The table to obtain the data records

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: A specific column to obtain the data records in a table

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date for obtaining data records from a table

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date for obtaining data records from a table

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The start time for obtaining data records from a table

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The end time, excluded, for obtaining data records from a table

optional.column: Column name in the list of table presented here

mandatory.table: Table name in the list of table presented here

queryResource: SELECT TOP 1 LocalCol,COLUMN FROM dbo.TABLE ORDER BY LocalCol DESC;
queryRawData: SELECT DATECOLUMN, TARGET FROM TABLE WHERE DATECOLUMN >=  'START_DATE START_TIME' AND DATECOLUMN <= 'END_DATE END_TIME'
queryAnalyticsData: SELECT DATEADD(minute, (INTERVAL * FLOOR(DATEDIFF(minute, 0, DATECOLUMN) / INTERVAL)), 0) as datetime, TARGET FROM TABLE WHERE DATECOLUMN >=  'START_DATE START_TIME' AND (DATECOLUMN < 'END_DATE END_TIME' OR (DATEDIFF(minute, 'END_DATE END_TIME', DATECOLUMN) % INTERVAL = 0 AND DATECOLUMN <= 'END_DATE END_TIME')) GROUP BY DATEADD(minute, (INTERVAL * FLOOR(DATEDIFF(minute, 0, DATECOLUMN) / INTERVAL)), 0) order BY DATEADD(minute, (INTERVAL * FLOOR(DATEDIFF(minute, 0, DATECOLUMN) / INTERVAL)), 0)
queryAnalyticsData_binary: WITH ModeData AS ( SELECT DATEADD(minute, (INTERVAL * FLOOR(DATEDIFF(minute, 0, DATECOLUMN) / INTERVAL)), 0) as datetime, TARGET as mode_value, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DATEADD(minute, (INTERVAL * FLOOR(DATEDIFF(minute, 0, DATECOLUMN) / INTERVAL)), 0) ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) as mode_rank FROM TABLE WHERE DATECOLUMN >= 'START_DATE START_TIME' AND (DATECOLUMN < 'END_DATE END_TIME' OR (DATEDIFF(minute, 'END_DATE END_TIME', DATECOLUMN) % INTERVAL = 0 AND DATECOLUMN <= 'END_DATE END_TIME')) GROUP BY DATEADD(minute, (INTERVAL * FLOOR(DATEDIFF(minute, 0, DATECOLUMN) / INTERVAL)), 0), TARGET) SELECT datetime, mode_value FROM ModeData WHERE mode_rank = 1 ORDER BY  datetime
